Description: TapStack - Secure baseline infrastructure with KMS, VPC, ALB, WAF, EC2, Lambda, CloudTrail, and optional GuardDuty (us-east-1)

ProjectName.Description: Lowercase project name used in resource names (must be DNS-safe for S3 buckets)

AllowedIngressCIDRForAlbHttp.Description: CIDR block allowed to access ALB HTTP port

EnableGuardDuty.Description: Create a GuardDuty detector in this region (one per account/region). Set true only if none exists.

Description.Fn::Sub: ${ProjectName} customer-managed KMS key for data-at-rest encryption

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for VPC interface endpoints
Security group for Application Load Balancer

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: App port to targets in VPC

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for EC2 instances (no SSH)
